accessibility.text: Applying Augmented Reality to Visualize the History of Traditional Architecture in Taiwan (2009)
Hassan response included: “… historical/traditional sites that could be explored via the same methods applied here. Sites that are either hard to get to, or they have been removed/destroyed etc.”
